alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 30 at 2:07PM PDT until March 31 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Mendocino Coast, Southeastern Mendocino Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior
